game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an adventure to locate the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Solve riddles, overcome obstacles, and explore mysterious locations to uncover the hidden secrets of the treasure. Be prepared to face challenges and test your skills of deduction and problem-solving.
game.reward: A chest full of precious gems and artifacts

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the Sphinx
tasks.description: Travel to the sandy dunes of the desert and find the legendary Sphinx. Decipher the riddle it challenges you with to proceed to the next task.
Head to the ancient library hidden in the dense jungle. Find the hidden chamber and retrieve the ancient map that leads to the treasure's location.
Enter the dangerous underground caves that are said to be filled with traps and puzzles. Solve them to safely reach the chamber where the treasure awaits.
Discover the mystical gate guarded by powerful enchantments. Collect the required artifacts from different locations and solve the puzzles to unlock the gate and reveal the treasure.
